item.title: CVE-2024-22362|2024-01-16T03:39:51.445Z -- Drupal.org -- Drupal
item.description: Drupal contains a vulnerability with improper handling of structural elements. If this vulnerability is exploited, an attacker may be able to cause a denial-of-service (DoS) condition.
